Articles.Content: I've been a bit lax on keeping up with the news since a bit before the ARM update. For some reason the idea of it never quite grabbed me, so anyone care to fill me in on any news? (What's in 0.25, if that has been announced, fancy stuff I might not know about 0.24 even and so on)

Hello Sigma, this update we are currently 0.23.5- the ARM update. We have no news on 0.24 or anything beyond that; The ARM update has brought lots of new parts, mainly even BIGGER parts- Probodobodyne parts, based on NASA's design -the co-operated with KSP- have been added, ranging from huge engines to massive boosters. The Asteroid Redirect Mission (ARM) is using "The Klaw" that can attach to ANY object in the game- its used to redirect asteroids, detected in the Tracking Station, to where-ever you want. Major tweaks to the Science tree and a few other things- people, feel free to fill in the gaps
Upgraded joint strenght Now you have actually try to build wobbly rockets

I've been a bit lax on keeping up the ARM update.
For some reason the idea of it never quite grabbed me

Oh the glorious puns! XD

For me the best thing to come out of ARM is the improved maneuver nodes. They are now persistent, you can see what your SOI intercept orbits look like by double-clicking the target, and you can set them for future orbits.
